full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'DOD LHA SNA TSOGS LA BRTEN PA'I SDIG LTUNG BSHAGS BSDOMS BYA TSUL GYI SKOR BZHUGS, ,*, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS RDO RJE MI 'KHRUGS PA'I SGRUB THABS ZLA BA'I 'OD ZER CAN BZHUGS, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002B (ZHES PA 'DI NI KHAL KHA MKHAN PO BLO BZANG CHOS 'PHEL GI DGE SGRUB PA GNYER BA BSTAN PAYAR 'PHEL GYIS STOBS BZHI'I BSHAGS PA BSDAMS BYED TSUL 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA LTAR ^SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYIS SBYAR BA 'DI'I MTSAN NI ZLA BA'I 'OD ZER CAN ZHES BYA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE PHYOGS DUG KUN DU DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
